The U.S. is stronger and our enemies are weaker because of our energy security. America‚Äôs oil production has strengthened our country and our communities. North Dakota is proud to have played its part in our country‚Äôs path toward energy independence. https://www.washingtontimes.com/news/2019/sep/9/north-dakotas-bakken-oil-revolution-easing-global-/¬†‚Ä¶
Third - jobs, jobs, jobs. ND's 1.4 million barrels-per-day oil industry is larger than some OPEC countries and has created over 35,000 high-paying careers at an average salary of more than $98,000.

Second, the American people and the entire world reap the benefits of a stable oil market. Consumers and businesses can more adequately plan everything from a summer road trip to a major capital investment.
First, U.S. energy security means that the Iranian regime, or any other hostile actor, sees diminished political advantage from their dangerous actions intended to disrupt the global oil market.

North Dakota's Bakken oil revolution is a national security advantage that makes America stronger at home and abroad. 

Proud to write this op-ed about North Dakota's contribution to U.S. energy independence for @WashTimes  https://www.washingtontimes.com/news/2019/sep/9/north-dakotas-bakken-oil-revolution-easing-global-/¬†‚Ä¶
